commentThread.commentText: Nah Rom you are not old. You look like a young soul in an older body. You are how you feel.
Everybody is going to get older. People dont respect there elders at all.

Hey Rom. Since you brought up the subject of age, can you address the topic, "hitting the wall" in relation to women and men aging. I hate to hear men dogging women for becoming something inevitable, older, as if their mothers and grandmother's didn't age. That' s lam e! Black women are some of the most beautiful, aging creations on earth! The mantr a, "Black don't crack" is REAL!

I was blocked from a prominent male Youtubers page because I disagreed with his idea that woman reach middle age at 30. This unmarried man is over 50 and claimed that he wouldn't consider dating a woman over 33 lol. I think th at ageism is a weak minded person's way of a put down beca use age is something tha t is black and white and can't be argued. Only a man of poor character who doesn't appeal to women in their age bracket down women for their age.

replies.commentText: If this brotha knew what you looked like he would be in your inbox everyday.
Lol probably not 😜 but at least I got my point across and stood up for my 30+ ladies.

commentThread.commentText: Shit at least we made it at their rate maybe not. I don't talk to young people about nothing. No advice and i absolutely mean nothing. find out bitch on your own. Even my Damn family. It's not my generation and I don't five a fuck.
Forget the wise old owl, #wiseromwills

Ageism. Racism, whatever isms. We cant just openly exclude people but America is finding more subtle ways to do this. It's just another way to remove ppl out of the conversation and ultimately exterminate them. The second leading cause of death in the us is now is suicide. Anyway stay strong folks, show some humanity for each other and acknowledge each other. Peace
Every one is going to be older one day.
As they say at the VA " every body is a T.A.B, temporarily able bodied."
The multigenerational dialog must go on.   👍🏿

I did like the old Cats told me to do as a kid growing up in the ATL, 'kept waking up'. Next thing I know I was the older Cat, 50. I found out that everything they told me pretty much was right. Glad I listened to their game. Younger dude need to pull out coats to learn this Black man game like we did. It'll save em a lot of mistakes, time and money.
The new generation that listen to all this mumble rap bs are the ones that started really disrespecting they elders. It's cool, they're going to look 60 at the age 30.
The comforting thing about getting older is that everyone gets older with you
I tell these youngins that in timeless and their look is priceless

💯💯💯 My response is the same when someone says something about being old, washed up, hit the wall or whatever. I'm like what was the other alternative to hitting the wall?? Death is the only way to forever preserve your youth. I'll take growing old. For me it's an opportunity to be here and watch any descendants I may have navigate life!! I can help to steer them down a better path than the one I took. I can help them when they need help. All four of my grandparents are still alive and they are 90+. I hope to be here for even longer than that! Here's to growin g old 🥂🍾🍸

replies.commentText: lmao exactly. Everyone gets old so what's the big deal exactly? Better old than dead I say.

commentThread.commentText: I'm 45 and can't wait until I get to my 50s to start getting some discounts...lol
No! One aspires to be 50. EVERYONE wish they could stay 24, 25, 28, 31 or 33... That's it, No Older.

replies.commentText: Fuck that. That's when you broke

commentThread.commentText: You have to have some intelligence to survive period.
To quote the great Paul Mooney, young people today cant even wait to die that's why they kill each other.

What's up Big Rom, me and my brother's just hit our 50's and the young guy's and female's are curious exspeically the gails wisdom and knowledge is to be shared otherwise they have to find out the hard way Midwest living is an adventure you never know just going to the store area's tape off I'm like damn I just missed it before I came through just to see detectives casing the seen I move and groove an get back in sometimes its good when a person just look out the window.
That's is so common nowadays with young people, calling mature men - OLD HEAD... RFLMAO - The Flow.....I'm glad you addressed this - Th e disabled group is forgot (Great point)
Gray hairs the Crown of wisdom Uncle rom... These fools don't know.
I fully agree with you Uncle Rom. I hope I live a long life and continue to look young for my age at 36. Mixed race relationships have been happening since the dawn of time.
I think folks fear aging Uncle Rom which in some regards is understandable.  My hope is to still hVe the majority of my faculties as I progress and not fall apart.

your generation is that last wave as a whole that was raised with complete principles and standards Og! y'all are hard working and don't back down fam true American grit. as a whole the government and higher authority know this next wave of 40 plus years majority raised in single mother homes is push overs smh. just look at the agenda they pushing right is wrong wrong is right now. the children are lost and confused. keep raising yours right we gonna need em fam

replies.commentText: You dropped RAW knowledge in your statement. The current generation are more informed, but they don't have not sustainment power

commentThread.commentText:
Youth is wasted on the young. –George Bernard Shaw.

It's a privilege to grow older and hopefully wiser.
Great content as usual Rom!

Great point!! I've noticed that being older is more of a negative thing amongst us black people!! Young black people are quick to call yo u old to make it seem like your not important!! Seems like we have gotten away from respecting our elders!!

replies.commentText: It's unfortunate. Elders, especially Black ones, have shown they had what it takes to survive. They are a resource.

commentThread.commentText: The real irony most of us won't have any accomplishments like the same generation we talk down too.

Today's youths only think about what is " instant" and now... Most young adults don't respect their elders... They cuss, talk nasty and are down right just ugly acting.. They tape and post " Everything".. If you tell them there's a monster at the end of the road.. They will respond, how big is it and does it have a name? With age comes wisdom.. Is a saying you really don't understand until you have lived 40+ years.." Keep on trucking" to the 50+, still doing it and doing it well... There are a large number of adults < 50 with serious illness and laying up in a Hospital bed.. Excellent Topic! Mr.Rom..

Unfortunately most don't realize that we all age until after 30, for some even 40. Delusion lacks foresight and many young Americans fail to plan beyond their upcoming weekend party. Times are certainly changing and aging is that truth that exemplifies our vulnerability as mortals. Aging in the past was seen as an honorable process but then commerce became one of the highest honors and corporations created anti aging creams, Botox and other illusions. The saying goes everyone wants to get to heaven but no one wants to die.

replies.commentText: Well said. This is why I laugh when people mention women hitting the wall. We ALL will hit the wall. It's called aging! The only way to escape it is to die. Take care of your health ( mental, physical, emotional, spiritual and financial) when you're young and you'll age gracefully.

commentThread.commentText: Well be older. Wisdom ought to come with age. Older is better than DEAD any day.😕 I still wanna be young forever like 50 year olds who out work the "young uns". 😊.

The older I get , the better I look , I'm 36 and I date tons of 18 years old girls that the younger guys will never have , I'm NPC BODYBUILDER COMPITTITOR and fitness model and as long as you take care of yourself mentally, physically, emotionally and spiritually, age will be just a number .

replies.commentText: The best talk yet bruh, They say it like it's a bad thing to have age and platinum hair lmao
